title: flower rice cakes
description: This dessert with a difference is an impressive way to end any dinner party with a South-east Asian theme.Equipment and preparation: For this recipe, you will need a tiered steamer and, ideally, an electric juicer.
ingredients: 25g/1oz dried blue-pea flowers (also known as bunga telang - available from South-East Asian delicatessens or online specialists)
2 pandan leaves (available from South-East Asian delicatessens)
